TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITransformProvider

summary.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 对此控件模式的支持并不限于桌面上的对象。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 只要子级可以移动、 调整大小或容器的边界内自由地旋转，则还必须受到容器对象子级实现此控件模式。This control pattern must also be implemented by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

span.span: if the element can be moved; otherwise .

span.span: if the element can be rotated; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);
abstract member Move : double * double -> unit

param.name: x
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个可能的自定义控件，可以移动此方法的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be moved. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#move)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Move](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#move)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);
abstract member Resize : double * double -> unit

param.name: width
param.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用控件上时，支持拆分窗格，此方法可以产生副作用的大小调整其他相邻窗格。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的自定义控件，可以调整大小的一种可能的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that can be resized. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#resize)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Resize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#resize)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rotate (double degrees);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed
Public Sub Rotate (degrees As Double)
public: void Rotate(double degrees);
abstract member Rotate : double -> unit

param.name: degrees
param.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the control.

param.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、 调整大小或旋转以便其生成的屏幕位置将完全位于坐标其容器的和键盘或鼠标无法访问外部对象。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，当顶层窗口移动完全屏幕或子对象移动容器的视区边界之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这些情况下该对象被放置靠近尽可能使用顶部或左侧坐标被覆盖以位于容器边界内所请求的屏幕坐标。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个可能的自定义控件，在无法旋转此方法的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control that cannot be rotated. [!code-csharp[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/CSharp/TransformFragment.cs#rotate)] [!code-vb[UIAITransformProvider_snip#Rotate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAITransformProvider_snip/visualbasic/transformfragment.vb#rotate)]
